description: Situated on the road that crosses the archaeological park, this smart and elegant restaurant boasts two dining rooms arranged on two floors. In the kitchen, a young chef with plenty of previous experience working in renowned restaurants creates reinterpreted Sicilian dishes of the highest quality.
